name: Algae farming - Farming of algae - pressure layer from the WIO Symphony tool
description: Using data provided by Be Geospatial AB, algae farming locations were manually selected. To extract Chl-a concentration values, which serve as an indicator for eutrophication, 10-km buffer zones were applied around the algae farming sites. These values were obtained from GCOM, and subsequently linearly normalized within a 1-100 scale, and mapped onto a reference grid. Known limitations: The chl-a index were mapped under curtain period of time using cut off threshold, this could underestimate or overestimated the actual eurotripication within the region

citation: Zerne P (2023). Algae farming - ecosystem component from the WIO Symphony tool. URL: https://github.com/WIOSymphony/
